articles.content: Rita Wilson revealed in December that nine months after recovered from COVID-19, she still had the virus antibodies in her system.Now, she has revealed the antibodies are gone, potentially leaving he… [+2978 chars]

articles.title: Saved By The Bell star Dustin Diamond dies after three week battle with cancer - PerthNow
articles.description: Dustin Diamond — who was best known for playing Samuel ‘Screech’ Powers in the hit sitcom — has died after a short battle with stage four cancer.
articles.content:
Saved By The Bell star Dustin Diamond has died after a short battle with lung cancer.
